name: Really Ridiculous Rectangular Rhomboids
description:
Pick up blocks and throw them! Solve puzzles! Bounce on trampolines! Play with fire! What could be more satisfying? Besides perhaps several things?

A quick and easy forty minute game made for a school project. This is the story of a child who just wants to go home. Please enjoy it and don't give me money. Thank you.

Featuring music from Sheridan Woika:

https://whhawj.bandcamp.com/album/we-hold-hands-an...

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move

RIGHT-click or SPACE to lift/throw a block

LEFT-click to place a block.

"Q" to zoom in.

"E" to zoom out.

"R" to reset the stage.

"X" to return to the title screen.
